In the past year, he won the Pok√©mon World Coronation Series and will also be retiring as the protagonist of the Pok√©mon anime. For those who grew up with him, it‚Äôs a bittersweet transition ‚Äî but we‚Äôll hopefully get some closure in a reunion with his old pals: Misty and Brock. Rather than a movie or special, Ash‚Äôs adventure will end with a season-ending run of Pok√©mon Ultimate...

item.content:encoded: Image: Hasbro Chef White can murder me Hasbro released its modernized version of the classic murder mystery board game Clue on Wednesday. The refreshed edition features new art and miniatures, and most importantly, a hot new cast. Now, people are thirsting over characters like Chef White, who has single-handedly imbued the classic family board game with horniness. The new edition brings a more diverse group to the game, which has historically had a predominantly white cast. The new game also ha...

item.description: Image: Hempuli Taxes don‚Äôt make sense and neither does this game Baba, a sheep-like creature and star of the 2019 indie darling Baba Is You, doesn‚Äôt know how to read or write. This is a problem beca...
item.content:encoded: Image: Hempuli Taxes don‚Äôt make sense and neither does this game Baba, a sheep-like creature and star of the 2019 indie darling Baba Is You, doesn‚Äôt know how to read or write. This is a problem because, as it turns out, Baba needs to do some important paperwork! In the joke-turned-game, Baba Files Taxes, you‚Äôre tasked with helping the armless critter file his taxes. The short game is an exercise in confusion, and really the best way to emotionally prepare for the absurdity of the upcoming 2023...
